thread.title: EU SHOWDOWN: Desperate Merkel flies to Poland as she scrambles to save Brussels bloc
thread.title_full: EU SHOWDOWN: Desperate Merkel flies to Poland as she scrambles to save Brussels bloc

title: EU SHOWDOWN: Desperate Merkel flies to Poland as she scrambles to save Brussels bloc
text:
EU SHOWDOWN: Desperate Merkel flies to Poland as she scrambles to save Brussels bloc EU SHOWDOWN: Desperate Merkel flies to Poland as she scrambles to save Brussels bloc GERMAN Chancellor Angela Merkel is scrambling to save the EU as she travels to Eurosceptic Poland for showdown talks. PUBLISHED: 02:29, Tue, Feb 7, 2017 | UPDATED: 02:46, Tue, Feb 7, 2017 GETTY German Chancellor Angela Merkel is flying to Poland for talks about the future of the EU 
Poland has lost a Eurosceptic ally in Britain and wants assurances from Merkel regarding the direction of the European Union. 
According to Sebastian Plociennik, an expert at the Polish Institute of International Affairs, the trip is "one of the most important visits in Polish-German relations since 2004.” GETTY The talks are important as Merkel works to avoid Poland following Britain in leaving the EU 
He added: “This year, 2017, will be very important for European integration and the decisions made this year will set the path for the EU's future.” 
Merkel said: "We have a Europe of different speeds - every time that is said, it awakens the impression that this is something new, but my opinion is that it is nothing new.” Europe in Crisis
